MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:45PM to safely remove generator and replace electrical equipment at Cormiston Villa and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:38 PM on Tuesday, 15 December 2020.
